mapper.insert: insert into member(name, memberId, password, email, phoneNo, memberType, rankNo) values(#{name}, #{memberId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNo}, #{memberType}, #{rankNo})
mapper.update: update member set sessionKey = #{sessionId}, sessionLimit = #{next} where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from member where name=#{name} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where memberId = #{memberId}
